oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A VERSATILE SOFT-X-RAY APPEARANCE POTENTIAL SPECTROMETER
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PADALIA, BD
SHINDE, PS
KORGAONKAR, AV
CARVALHO, WCJ
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A versatile soft x-ray appearance potential spectrometer with UHV and several other facilities has been designed and constructed using HAMAMATSU-make Cu-BeO photoelectron multiplier for the detection of soft x rays. Salient features of the design and construction aspects of the instrument and its performance are discussed.
